answerText: Kingdom of Spain[10] Another "Generacion" of Spanish authors appeared in this twentieth-century year, to commemorate the death of Luis de Gongora. Federico Garcia Lorca was the best-known author from the Generation of this year.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Georgia Tech and Williams | 18 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One novelist from this country called some of his works "nivolas" rather than novels, including his story about a novel subtitled "History of a Passion," Abel Sanchez. For 10 points each: [10] Name this country, whose Generacion de '98 included Miguel de Unamuno and Pio Baroja.
